Intentions + Hello World

25 May 2013

As with every new iteration of a personal website my intentions to keep this up to date are pure. Topics to be discussed include design, code, beer, coffee, personal projects and much more.

So, lets start with the underlying technology. This blog is generated by jekyll hosted on GitHub. You can view the code here. More than one post will have been drafted on a iPhone / iPad / Nexus 7 in vim or in iawriter.

Hello, I'm Eric, a Sr. UX engineer at Cuker Interactive. A developer and designer that builds responsive applications.
